backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user registration, role assignment, userId generation, and superadmin claiming with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user role structures to the new format while preserving IDs and flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend and backend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app handling route-based rendering without a router using manual pathname switching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form collecting basic user info like name, email, WhatsApp, and company.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing a static welcome message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Asistenmu dashboard displaying a static appreciation message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard with a simple control-room message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard showing a gratitude message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard with a financial health message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard presenting a growth-oriented message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard with a system-control message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal landing page offering links to internal login and registration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Provides a static internal login UI allowing role selection with disabled login buttons.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Renders a static internal registration form with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and role.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering login and registration links for clients, partners, and internal users.
Displays a partner login page with disabled authentication buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Shows a partner registration form including personal details, WhatsApp, skills, and domicile fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, writing, and persisting URL parameters via query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and including typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Defines backend-only modification rules, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for the project. Specifies strict constraints for updating backend/main.mo while keeping all frontend files unchanged.
